notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, N.N.-J. and R.N.; data curation, N.N.-J.; funding acquisition, R.N.; investigation, N.N.-J., M.K.L., U.G.-D., N.S. and Z.K.; methodology, N.N.-J., R.N., M.K.L., W.R., U.G.-D. and Z.K.; project administration, N.N.-J. and R.N.; resources, N.N.-J.; writing—original draft, N.N.-J.; writing—review and editing, R.N., M.K.L. and U.G.-D. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
